channel.title: EDITED: Is it possible to edit maps and structures like buildings?
channel.description:
EDIT:
Alright, i got the last problem solved. Now, is there a way to edit maps and buildings/walls and stuff?
Cause all of my models are just weapons/armors/off hands stuff like that.
Can you tell me how to edit maps and such?

item.title: EDITED: Is it possible to edit maps and structures like buildings?
item.dc:creator: @DePredaTe DePredaTe
item.description:
@DePredaTe wrote:

no, i guess you can’t.
i went ahead and found a relatively nice city. and i’m going to rip it down through objects and just rebuild a completely new city.

also, does anyone know how to get everything off the client?
such as, the XP stuff (attack xp, magic xp, construction xp) off of the client. I deleted the icons but you can still click it and everything like that. I want to remove it all so it just looks completely blank. any help?

Read full topic
item.source: EDITED: Is it possible to edit maps and structures like buildings?

item.title: EDITED: Is it possible to edit maps and structures like buildings?
item.dc:creator: @cdoggy cdoggy
item.description:
@cdoggy wrote:

I’m slightly new to clients, what is the file type of the map model file? and I can get you desert coords easily, but is there not some way you could edit your map model file?

Read full topic

anyone else who can help, that would be awesome.

I need a completely blank map. XD

i need a map that isn’t really suppose to be in the game, but it’s just complete flatness.

i posted on yours too.[/quote]
Sorry mate, this is where my knowledge stops. I’m not a good client person(obviously)

item.title: EDITED: Is it possible to edit maps and structures like buildings?
item.dc:creator: @david7147 david7147
item.description:
@david7147 wrote:

[quote=“DePredaTe, post:7, topic:322002”]Alright, i got that going. I have the models being d/led right now.

Do you know of any maps that are just completely flat?
It would best best if they had absolutely NOTHING on them. Like, maybe something really plain, without hills, something like that?[/quote]
The desert? I’m not sure tbh, and could you help me with my client help problem? Much appreciated
